name: WeatherOperationsSnapshot
summary: WeatherGenius operational snapshot for field deployment teams.
description: Blend meteorological alerts with logistics guidance so WeatherGenius can brief response coordinators in plain language.
acceptance_criteria: Captures active weather alerts for primary regions with severity classifications.
Translates alerts into recommended posture changes for field crews, noting timing windows.
Lists data sources consulted and timestamps the assessment for traceability.

name: SevereWeatherAlertEscalation
summary: Escalate severe weather threats with targeted notifications and protective guidance.
description: Continuously monitor NOAA/NWS alert feeds and local forecasts, determining when to notify duty officers and response teams with clear action paths.
acceptance_criteria: Identifies alert thresholds that require escalation and documents the triggering criteria.
Routes notifications to the correct duty officers with time-sensitive summaries and recommended actions.
Correlates alerts with forecast data to validate severity and anticipated impact windows before escalating.

escalation_policy.timeframe: Escalate within 10 minutes of extreme alerts
triggers: NWS severity classified as severe or extreme
